column1: The contrast in this election couldn’t be clearer-- Republican leadership is needed across the board to ensure Democrats don’t stunt our economic recovery following the coronavirus pandemic.   Too many small businesses have been lost because of government overreach.
President Trump's priority is getting the American people relief.   Speaker Pelosi is interested in scoring political points and helping her own special interest totally unrelated to covid.
I applaud President Trump's handling of the coronavirus pandemic. A prolonged closure of the national economy would have a detrimental impact.
